name: Coupling - GGJ 2022
description:
Finding love is hard, but you're here to help!

Match the candidates to each other. Each one has her own traits which may be incompatible with others.

But beware - too long "on the market" and people will despair!

Made in (a bit less than) 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2021.

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/coupling-love-pod-2

Credits:

Alex Levin - Game design, balance

Alon Kaplan - Music, sound and game design

Daniel Rosen - Game design

Ran Zabaro - Art and game design

Yoav Biderman - Programming, balance and game design

Yuval Kalugny - Programming and game design
